an6.40:1: Thus have I heard. On one occasion the Blessed One was dwelling at Kimbilā in aniculagrove. Then the Venerable Kimbila approached the Blessed One, paid homage to him, sat down to one side, and said:
an6.40:2: "What is the cause and reason why, Bhante, the good Dhamma continues long after a Tathāgata has attained final nibbāna?"
